attributes.action: Everyone must speak English, also ban the burqa !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This applies to England ,only, I realise our friends in Wales and Scotland have their own gaelic tongue :-)
The burqa is offensive and a statement of anti-establishment, there is NO known need to wear one. Please follow the Dutch Government's ruling and follow it.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Everyone must speak English, also ban the burqa!."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
